I agree - after no shouting """"fire"""" in a theatre - there should be total free speech - but - UNFORTUNATELY - there isn't ESPECIALLY - here in AMERICA. CASE IN POINT: When someone reports """"wrong doing' on internet or anywhere for that matter, litigation follows suit - WRONG! Defamation of character is that when someone defames oneself - he/she - has done it to himself/herself - not messenger of it. Yet, lawyers will make BIG BUCKS getting perpetrators of ill-will for themselves to take the messenger to court. AGAIN - WRONG! Where's there's smoke - there's FIRE! Freedom of speech is everyone's right to say what's on one's mind - pure and simple - & if baseless/groundless - it will freely talk about itself in time - NOT - through courts.
